Html:
Hello all!

I am working on a project that leverages D3 to display some plots based upon items containing many pieces of data.

When we increase the number of items, from say, 5 -> 200, slowing our app down quite a bit, Plotter.CreateVisualProxy throws the InvalidOperationException, saying "Wrong state of visual bindings".

 

I was hoping someone could shed some light on this exception as to

1. Why its thrown

2. Possible reasons for how it could be thrown when working with a large enough data set to slow down the application

3. Tips to approach this debugging, as I am currently looking around the documentation for more information as I know very little of D3.

Thank you!
